sentences: Veronika "Vera" Schmidt (4 May 1982) is a Hungarian pop singer-songwriter who rose to popularity after finishing fifth in the Hungarian version of Pop Idol Megasztár.
She is a student in Eötvös Loránd University, Budapest.
Vera Schmidt was born in Miskolc.
Nézhetnélek (2005)When Vera Schmidt worked on own album, Jamie Wichester and Róbert Hrutka helped her.
Top 5:  Minden szónál többet ér egy dal by Peter Máté
Top 4:  Another Day in Paradise  by Phil Collins
